GSP29gaunys_u:11: 1.1.4: indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāyātmakam pratyakṣam
GSP29gaunys_u:13: 1.1.5: atha tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānaṃ pūrvavat śeṣavat
GSP29gaunys_u:31: 1.1.13: pṛthivī āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam iti bhūtāni
GSP29gaunys_u:52: 1.1.23: samānānekadharmopapatteḥ vipratipatteḥ upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthātaḥ ca viśeṣāpekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:54: 1.1.24: yam artham adhikṛtya pravartate tat prayojanam
GSP29gaunys_u:56: 1.1.25: laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasmin arthe buddhisāmyam saḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:84: 1.1.38: udāharaṇāpekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ na tathā iti vā sādhyasya
GSP29gaunys_u:90: 1.1.40: avijñātatatve arthe kāraṇopapattitaḥ tattvajñānārtham uhaḥ tarkaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:121: 1.2.11: tat trividham - vākchalam sāmānyacchalam upacāracchalam ca iti
GSP29gaunys_u:123: 1.2.12: aviśeṣābhihite arthe vaktuḥ abhiprāyāt arthāntarakalpanā vākchalam
GSP29gaunys_u:154: 2.1.6: yathoktādhyavasāyāt eva tadviśeṣāpekṣāt saṃśaye na asaṃśayaḥ na atyantasaṃśayaḥ vā
GSP29gaunys_u:160: 2.1.9: pūrvaṃ hi pramāṇasiddhau na indriyārthasannikarṣāt pratyakṣotpattiḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:179: 2.1.20: kvacit nivṛttidarśanāt anivṛttidarśanāt ca kvacit anekāntaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:192: 2.1.26: pratyakṣanimittatvāt ca indriyārthayoḥ sannikarṣasya svaśabdena vacanam
GSP29gaunys_u:203: 2.1.32: na, pratyakṣeṇa yāvat tāvat api upalambhāt {siddhānta-sūtra}
GSP29gaunys_u:210: 2.1.37: senāvanavat grahaṇam iti cet na atīndriyatvāt aṇūnām
GSP29gaunys_u:231: 2.1.48: na apratyakṣe gavaye pramāṇārtham upamānasya paśyāmaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:233: 2.1.49: tathā iti upasaṃhārāt upamānasiddheḥ na aviśeṣaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:259: 2.1.65: stutiḥ nindā parakṛtiḥ purākalpaḥ iti arthavādaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:289: 2.2.9: asati arthe na abhāvaḥ iti cet na, anyalakṣaṇopapatteḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:298: 2.2.14: na, ghaṭābhāvasāmānyanityatvāt nityeṣu api anityavat upacārāt ca
GSP29gaunys_u:328: 2.2.31: anyat anyasmāt ananyatvāt ananyat iti anyatābhāvaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:330: 2.2.32: tadabhāve na asti ananyatā, tayoḥ itaretarāpekṣasiddheḥ {siddhānta-sūtra}
GSP29gaunys_u:346: 2.2.43: dvividhasya api hetoḥ abhāvāt asādhanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:361: 2.2.53: nityānām atīndriyatvāt taddharmavikalpāt ca varṇavikārāṇām apratiṣedhaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:365: 2.2.55: vikāradharmitve nityatvābhāvāt kālāntare vikāropapatteḥ ca apratiṣedhaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:390: 2.2.66: vyaktyākṛtiyukte api aprasaṅgāt prokṣaṇādināṃ mṛdgavake jātiḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:453: 3.1.32: kṛṣṇasāre sati upalambhāt vyatiricya ca upalambhāt saṃśayaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:497: 3.1.63: ap-tejo-vāyūnāṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvam apohya ākāśasya uttaraḥ {pūrvapakṣa-sūtra}
GSP29gaunys_u:530: 3.2.10: sphaṭike api aparāparotpatteḥ kṣaṇikatvāt vyaktīnām ahetuḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:543: 3.2.17: kvacit vināśakāraṇānupalabdheḥ kvacit ca upalabdheḥ anekāntaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:557: 3.2.25: jñānasamavetātmapradeśasannikarṣāt manasaḥ smṛtyutpatteḥ na yugapat utpattiḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:581: 3.2.38: yathoktahetutvāt pāratantryāt akṛtābhyāgamāt ca na manasaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:636: 3.2.68: tat adṛṣṭakāritam iti cet punaḥ tatprasaṅgaḥ apavarge
GSP29gaunys_u:863: 5.1.7: prāpya sādhyamaprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyāviśiṣṭatvādaprāptyāsādhāka tvācca prāptyaprāptisamau {siddhānta-sūtra}
GSP29gaunys_u:876: 5.1.15: sādharmyātsaṃśaye na saṃśayo vaidharmyādubhayathā vā saṃśaye
GSP29gaunys_u:913: 5.1.34: dṛṣṭānte ca sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya tasysa
GSP29gaunys_u:927: 5.1.42: pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣamabhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā
GSP29gaunys_u:934: 5.2.1: pratijñāhāniḥ pratijñāntaraṃ pratijñāvirodhaḥ pratijñāsannyāso hetvantaram arthāntaraṃ nirarthakam avijñātārtham apārthakam aprāpta kālaṃ nyūnam adhikaṃ punaruktam ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇaṃ niranuyojyānuyogo 'pasiddhānto hetvā bhāsāśca nigrahasthānāni
GSP29gaunys_u:943: 5.2.6: aviśeṣokte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣamicchato hetvantaram {hetvantaram lakṣaṇa-sūtram}
GSP29gaunys_u:955: 5.2.14: śabdārthayoḥ punarvacanaṃ punaruktam anyatra anuvādāt {punaruktam lakṣaṇa-sūtram}
GSP29gaunys_u:956: 5.2.15: anuvāde tu apunaruktaṃ śabdābhyāsāt arthaviśeṣopapatteḥ {punaruktam lakṣaṇāpavādasūtram}
GSP29gaunys_u:959: 5.2.17: vijñātasya pariṣadā triḥ abhihitasya api apratyuccāraṇam
GSP29gaunys_u:968: 5.2.21: svapakṣe doṣābhyupagamāt parapakṣe doṣaprasaṅgaḥ matānujñā {matānujñā lakṣaṇa-sūtram}
GSP29gaunys_u:973: 5.2.24: siddhāntam abhyupetya aniyamāt kathāprasaṅgaḥ apasiddhāntaḥ {apasiddhānta lakṣaṇa-sūtram}
